p.p: We use the result of the previous problem, together with the fact that

text.p: to give us our desired conclusion that [mathjaxinline]T\circ S(u) \ne T\circ S(v)[/mathjaxinline]. Therefore [mathjaxinline]T\circ S[/mathjaxinline] is into, and we have proven our proposition!

font.p: From the previous proposition, we have that [mathjaxinline]S(u)\ne S(v)[/mathjaxinline]. Next, we are applying [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline], so we use the fact that [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into to show that [mathjaxinline]T\circ S(u) \ne T\circ S(v)[/mathjaxinline].
